thread.title: Venuemasters welcomes The Examination Schools in Oxford
thread.title_full: Venuemasters welcomes The Examination Schools in Oxford

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Venuemasters welcomes The Examination Schools in Oxford
text:
Venuemasters welcomes The Examination Schools in Oxford Venuemasters welcomes The Examination Schools in Oxford Details Created   16:30 Venuemasters, the consortium promoting event facilities at UK academic venues, has added another member to its portfolio. The Examination Schools in Oxford is the latest member to join the consortium, which promotes the meeting and accommodation facilities available for hire at 70 academic venues across the country. 
Based just outside the city centre, the Examination Schools offer a fantastic setting for meetings and events of all sizes. Boasting Oxford's largest city centre conference venue with nearly 26,000 square feet of floor space, the Examination Schools offer an elegant Grade II listed academic venue, with numerous rooms able to cater for small day meetings, large conferences of up to 400 delegates, as well as large-sized dining. Senior Event Marketing Manager at the Examination Schools, Kay Hogg said: “We are delighted to have joined Venuemasters, one of the UK’s leading venue consortiums. As the University of Oxford’s largest venue, we are keen to raise the profile of the Examination Schools, an exquisite Grade II listed venue in the city centre of Oxford. With 30 years’ experience in promoting academic venues, we believe Venuemasters is an excellent way to raise our profile and looking forward to working with the team.” The historic venue has played host to some of the country’s greatest thinkers, so provides a superb backdrop for a range of events, making it’s a real talking point for event attendees. Venuemasters’ Marketing Manager, Natalie Williamson said: “It’s great to expand our portfolio of academic venues and offer event organisers a superb range of locations and facilities.” Related articles
